purpose: Outline the topics to be covered in the presentation.
title: Agenda

bullets.highlight: Chapter 1: Key terms of reward economics
bullets.text: Earn rate, Burn rate, Give back rate, Cost per point, Active engagement rate & Customer satisfaction, Redeemed vs earned & Expired vs earned

Framework for impact calculation, Assessment of status quo, Evaluation of current financial impact, Creation of loyalty proposition and comparative analysis, Validation and finalization of proposition
Customer lifecycle, Pan bank loyalty program
